data.question: Who were the architects of the Government of India Act, 1919?
What significant legislative feature was introduced by the Government of India Act, 1919?
What was the main principle behind the division of subjects under the Government of India Act, 1919?
What were the two categories of provincial subjects introduced by the Act of 1919?
Which communities were granted communal representation under the Government of India Act, 1919?
data.answer: Sikhs, Indian Christians, Anglo-Indians, and Europeans
arr: Sikhs, Indian Christians, Anglo-Indians, and Europeans

data.question: What did the Government of India Act, 1919, introduce regarding elections?
data.answer: Direct elections for certain categories of members
arr: Direct elections for certain categories of members
Representation based on the caste system

data.question: What was the provision for reviewing the Government of India Act, 1919?
In which year was the Simon Commission appointed?
What was the primary mandate of the Simon Commission?
data.answer: To study the Government of India Act, 1919
arr: To study the Government of India Act, 1919
To grant dominion status to India

data.question: What was the primary reason for opposition to the Simon Commission?
data.answer: The exclusion of Indians from its membership
arr: The exclusion of Indians from its membership
Its plan to abolish communal representation
Its proposal to separate Burma from India

data.question: What was the slogan raised during the protests against the Simon Commission?
Which leaderâ€™s death intensified opposition to the Simon Commission?
What was the outcome of the Simon Commission protests?
arr: Formation of the Congress Working Committee

data.question: When was the Communal Award announced?
Which British Prime Minister announced the Communal Award?
What was the purpose of the Communal Award?
data.answer: To provide separate electorates for various communities
arr: To provide separate electorates for various communities

data.question: Which community was newly included in the separate electorates under the Communal Award?
How did Mahatma Gandhi respond to the Communal Award?
data.answer: He started a fast unto death in Yerwada Jail
arr: He organized a mass protest in Delhi
He started a fast unto death in Yerwada Jail
He called for a boycott of British goods

data.question: What was the outcome of the Poona Pact?
data.answer: Reserved seats for Dalits in joint electorates
arr: Reserved seats for Dalits in joint electorates

data.question: Which act is referred to as the 'Blueprint of the Indian Constitution'?
What was the major administrative feature of the Government of India Act, 1935?
arr: Introduction of dyarchy at the provincial level

data.question: Which new institution was established under the Government of India Act, 1935?
Which country was separated from India under the Government of India Act, 1935?
What was the voting right percentage under the Government of India Act, 1935?
What was the Federal List under the Government of India Act, 1935?
Who oversaw the implementation of the Government of India Act, 1935?
What was the Concurrent List under the Government of India Act, 1935?
data.answer: Subjects under joint control of the Centre and Provinces
arr: Subjects under joint control of the Centre and Provinces
